searchform.i-want-to-buy-a-car: I want to buy a car
searchform.i-want-to-sell-a-car: I want to sell a car
searchform.sell-to-dealership-advantage: Advantage: Time saving and efficient, to help in minimizing costs incurred for keeping the car.
searchform.sell-to-dealership-insufficiency: Insufficiency: Selling price would be comparatively lower.
searchform.sell-to-individual-advantage: Advantage: Selling price would be comparatively higher, with more flexibility.
searchform.sell-to-individual-insufficiency: Insufficiency: It is time-consuming and not efficient enough, not recommending for those who are rushing to sell the car.
searchform.buy-from-dealership-advantage: Advantage: Dealers use to have more selling cars for potential buyers to view, test and select. Potential buyers donâ€™t need to do much researches on car models. Trading with dealership would be more protective than with individuals.
searchform.buy-from-dealership-insufficiency: Insufficiency: Buying price would be comparatively higher.
searchform.buy-from-individual-advantage: Advantage: Buying price would be comparatively lower, with more flexibility.
searchform.buy-from-individual-insufficiency: Insufficiency: Taking more time for researches on car models and relevant information. Potential buyers need to spend more effort on inspecting cars conditions and there could be higher risk posed to them.
searchform.contact: Need our help on trading cars or other services? Please copy this screenshot into the email and write down your need, our staff will contact you and follow-up.
searchform.please-wait: Your report will be completed in 60 seconds, please wait.

homepage.step1: Select car marker, class, model and year of manufacture
homepage.step2: Your search will be processed by vCon's huge database and unique algorithm
homepage.transparent-description: We provide range of quotes according to different conditions of the car, there are no hidden costs or terms in our services. Our only goal is to make your trade smoother and easier.
homepage.save-time-description: Our huge database provides car quotes which reflect current market trends together with all the included fees of buying a car. You have all the needed information here.
homepage.the-best-description: The first one-stop solution to used car valuation and trading in Hong Kong.
homepage.testimonial1: This site provides reviews and advice on vehicles from people who know about cars. From buying to selling your car, vCon generates quotes from more than 500 motor models. Highly recommend this site for all the car users/buyers/sellers out there!
homepage.testimonial2: User friendly, easy to use, everything was simple and organized well. vCon leads you through the whole process from researching the right vehicle to providing the current market valuation reports. No other website like this!

meta.title: vCon - Hong Kong Used Cars Valuation
meta.desciption: vCon is Hong Kong first online used car valuation platform. We calcuate the market price of your desired car based on the car model and year of manufacture, including other required expenses.
meta.keywords: carvcon, vcon, used car, second hand car, 2nd hand car, car valuation, car trade, car price
